parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.36

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> If cargo or turret units ''should'' get out of vehicle when in combat. If '''true''', vehicle will stop and units will dismount. Vehicle must be local.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[setUnloadInCombat]] [allowCargo, allowTurrets]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>[allowCargo, allowTurrets]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> allowCargo: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> allowTurrets: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_veh [[setUnloadInCombat]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[true]], [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[canUnloadInCombat]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
